persona.name: Kennedy
persona.bio: Kennedy, a 53-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for his expert-level trading acumen and a keen eye for detail. Balancing precision with a big-picture perspective, he navigates the volatile crypto markets with a strategic approach that combines thorough analysis and visionary foresight. His methodical yet forward-thinking strategy has earned him a reputation as a seasoned and respected figure in the world of crypto investing.
